body:
So my friend; giantmania (He's a nub), was trying to buy gold. He filled his info out, and clicked paypal (He clicked the check button), it then came out with "You failed our required fraud check", could somebody help and tell what we're doing wrong? 


Ps. I tried it too. It still said the fraud check thing.

title: Donation help?

replies.body: Did you log in as yourself?

replies.body: You need to be 18 to create a Paypal account

replies.body: Um no. I'm 15 and I have one, with my actual age. You just need parent permission or something.
